about_the_game:
In Hoppin: Buna's Adventure, you take on the role of Buna, a devoted mother rabbit navigating a perilous forest to feed her family. Using swift dashes and agile maneuvers, chain precise jumps to gain momentum, solve intricate puzzles, and race through lush environments.

Explore Nature
Traverse diverse landscapes, encounter new creatures, and overcome the challenges that stand in your way.

Collect Food
Satisfy your baby bunny’s ultra-specific cravings by gathering various fruits scattered across each stage and biome.

Dash Around
Solve puzzles and natural obstacles swiftly by chaining jumps and maneuvers, gaining speed, and reaching even greater distances.

  • OS: Windows 10

short_description: Leap into action in Hoppin: Buna's Adventure! Play as Buna, a swift mother rabbit dashing through the forest to feed her family. Chain precise jumps, gain speed, and solve clever puzzles as you race through each stage. Can you surpass the challenges of the nature? Hop in and find out!
